original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares edge up in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘s shares edged up in mid day trade on Wednesday, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was up 1.11 percent or 120.05 points to 10,916.12, the most liquid index S&P SL20 was up 0.74 percent or 23.40 points to 3,186.06
Top gainers were Sampath Bank, DFCC and Commercial Bank. (Colombo/July19/2023)
